sentences.sentence: Unfortunately these drugs are quite toxic and hinder the body's ability to fight off infection.
sentences.translation: 不幸的是，这些药毒性很大，妨碍身体抗感染的能力。

sentences.sentence: It will only slow you down and hinder your career goals.
sentences.translation: 这只会拖慢你的速度，阻碍你实现职业目标。

sentences.sentence: The child shall not hinder me from accepting the offer, I tell you that!
sentences.translation: 我告诉你，这孩子不会妨碍我接受工作的！
